thread.title: Ranji Trophy: Mandeep, Uday flay Railways bowlers as Punjab reach 235/2
thread.title_full: Ranji Trophy: Mandeep, Uday flay Railways bowlers as Punjab reach 235/2 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ranji Trophy: Mandeep, Uday flay Railways bowlers as Punjab reach 235/2
text:
MOHALI: Mandeep Singh struck his ninth first-class century and added 178 runs with veteran keeper-batsman Uday Kaul (92 batting) as Punjab scored 235 for two against Railways on the opening day of their Ranji Trophy group league encounter.
Manan Vohra (5) and Jiwanjot Singh (31) with Punjab's scorecard reading 57 for two.
But that was the last success for the Railways as Mandeep scored an even 100 off 196 balls with 14 boundaries. Kaul's innings was a dogged effort as he hit only nine boundaries en route his 245-ball unbeaten vigil.
Skipper Yuvraj Singh is yet to get a bat. Arnab Nandi was the only successful bowler getting 1 for 55.
India discard Karn Sharma went wicketless in 21 overs while India A seamer Anureet Singh didn't play.
Punjab 1st Innings 235 for two (Mandeep Singh 100 not out, Uday Kaul 92 battingm Arnab Nandi 1/57) vs Railways.
